entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries at times heavy changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
